name: Operation Winter!
description:
Fight against hordes of evil snowmen who have attacked the Elf Village, in this twin-stick style shooter. Random weapons and events fill the theme of “Surprise!”, making it a unique experience each time you play!

Assets; Presents, Candy Cane Lampposts, String Lights on buildings and Christmas trees, Star on Christmas Tree (not the tree itself) and Snowman.
The above assets were made by us, while the rest were from various Synty packs.

Team Members:
